sentences.en: 'We heard about this more than 10 days ago, ' a local fishmonger, surnamed Zhang, said in a telephone interview Friday. 'We dare not drink tap water, and nobody eats freshwater fish these days.'
sentences.cn: 一位姓张的当地鱼贩周五接受电话采访时说，10多天前我们就听说了，我们不敢喝自来水，这些日子没人吃淡水鱼。

sentences.en: Don't be afraid to ask your fishmonger to fillet flat fish.
sentences.cn: 尽管叫鱼贩子把比目鱼的鱼刺剔掉。

sentences.en: I got the fishmonger to skin the fish which helped save on the preparation time.
sentences.cn: 我让鱼贩把鱼鳞刮了，这样准备烹制时能省点儿事。

sentences.en: I'll ask the fishmonger if he can order three dozen oysters for me.
sentences.cn: 我会问问那个卖鱼的,看看他能否给我定购3打牡蛎.

sentences.en: She bargained with the fishmonger over the price.
Some people go back to local small businesses: the Asian greengrocer, a Greek baker and a Greek fishmonger.
sentences.cn: 一些人愿意与当地的小商贩打交道，比如：亚洲菜贩，希腊面包师和希腊鱼贩。

sentences.en: The creature, three times the size of an average British edible oyster, was discovered in the bottom of a box of fish bought by a Cornish fishmonger, Peter Randall.
sentences.cn: 这只比英国中等大小的食用牡蛎还大两倍的巨型牡蛎，被康沃尔的鱼贩彼得·兰德尔在他买下的一箱鱼的底部发现的。

sentences.en: The fishmonger said,'sire, and see, all the fish are fresh. Won't you buy one? "
sentences.cn: 鱼贩子喊道:“先生, 过来看一看,瞧一瞧, 全场都是新鲜鱼, 你买一条 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Try to get your fishmonger to skin and gut the squid for you.
sentences.cn: 让鱼贩子帮你收拾一下鱿鱼,去皮和内脏.
